about_the_game:
Hen Town is a rogue-like game, exploring randomly generated maps, fighting against monsters.In this game, you transform into a powerful female knight, bearing a heavy and brave responsibility. Your mission is to fight ceaselessly against terrifying monsters, using skills and weapons to defeat them, protecting village and its inhabitants from devastation and threats posed by these malevolent creatures, bringing back light and hope to the entire village.
As you progress in the game, you can unlock permanent upgrades, enhancing your abilities and mastering the skill of survival.


Game Feature :

Hen Town features captivating anime characters, enhanced with high-quality 3D graphics.
The game includes endlessly created maps without borders, ensuring smooth gameplay even with numerous monsters displayed.
It offers a simple yet engaging survival experience with elements of roguelite.
Many upgrades for the main character.
variety of achievements to unlock.

name: Solo Levelup Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD HD 7870
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Hen Town is a rogue-like game, you are a female knight battles monsters, protects village restoring light and hope.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
